name: Moodle-tool cohortsync
body:
### Plugin description
***


This plugin allows the synchronization of cohorts and members in cohorts from the command line.
There are 2 scripts CLI to do the synchronization.
1. cohortsync.php
2. cohortmembersync.php

## The plugin configuration page
***
There are two level configuration:

### **Settings for synchronization cohorts**

* CSV delimiter: CSV delimiter of the cohorts file, this option will be used as default value if no option given for the CLI

* encoding: The type of encoding file, this option will be used as default value if no option given for the CLI

* default category: the default context category of the cohorts, if in the cohorts CSV file the category context is not filled or not found, this category will be used.


### Formats description
***

The following formats are allowed

    name,idnumber,description,descriptionformat,contextid,visible,username

The "username" is used as an identifier of the user can also use "user_id" or "user_idnumber"
If "visible" is not specified, it will be visible by default: Valid values are: "no" or 0 for no visible and "yes" or 1 for visible
"descriptionformat" is the type of chosen format for the description:
0 = Moodle auto-format
1 = HTML format
2 = Plain text format
4 = Markdown format

If the "contextid" is not found the context system will be used

All fields except the user (user_id, user_idnumber, username), are associated with cohort

    name,idnumber,description,descriptionformat,category_name,visible,username

We can use the "category_name" to get the context, if the category is not found the system context will be used
You can also replace the "category_name" by "category_path", "category_id" or "category_idnumber"

### Usage
***

To see the cli script help:
    php admin/tool/cohortsync/cli/cohortsync.php --help

![cohortsync-Help](http://shorturl.ca/images/cohortsync.PNG)

We can use the plugin in several ways
Configure the plugin with "The path to the file source" specified, in this case, we can just run the command:

    php admin/tool/cohortsync/cli/cohortsync.php

run the command with params:

    php admin/tool/cohortsync/cli/cohortsync.php --filepath=/pathfile/ --csvdelimeter=comma --createcohort=true --useridentifier=username --context=system
